channel.title: mueller on David Collantes
channel.description: Recent content in mueller on David Collantes

item.title: Mueller Goes After Trump Org
item.description: I have disliked other presidents in the past, for actions taken while they were in the office that I — and many others — considered stupid, crazy, or just plain wrong. My dislike for the current president eclipses any of my previous. I voted for Hillary, and wrongly predicted that she would win the presidency. Today news, although perhaps inconsequential, brings joy to an otherwise political nightmare. The special counsel, Robert S.
